content.rendered:
[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1579706454951{padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1652774462619{background-image: url(https://esplanade.hr/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/topline1.jpg?id=9005) !important;}”]

Press Service

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]

Esplanade Zagreb Hotel always welcomes media representatives.

If you’d like to obtain information related to the hotel, news, history, facts or gastronomy, wish to organize a press trip or an interview with members of our staff, our Press Service will always be glad to assist.

Please feel free to contact us:
T. +385 (0)1 4563 888
E. sonja.susak@esplanade.hr

Newsletter
If you wish to receive regularly our News&Events on your e-mail, please type it in the field at the bottom of this page and click on “Subscribe”.

DOWNLOADS
All our materials are at your disposal for download.

Download Links:
–    Photos of the hotel
–    Logo and Brand Guidelines

Videos:
– Hotel’s YouTube Channel

Brochures:
– Hotel Brochure
– Hotel Brochure – Arabic
– Hotel Brochure – Chinese
– Hotel Brochure – Japanese
– Hotel Brochure – Korean
– Hotel History Brochure
– Meetings and Events Brochure
– Hotel Fact Sheet Brochure
– Meetings & Events Floor Plan
– Health Club Brochure

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”28px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
